name: raycast-wallpaper
title: Raycast Wallpaper
description: Get and set Raycast official wallpapers.
author: koinzhang

commands.name: set-raycast-wallpaper
commands.title: Set Raycast Wallpaper
commands.description: Set Raycast official wallpapers as desktop wallpaper.

commands.name: auto-switch-raycast-wallpaper
commands.title: Auto Switch Raycast Wallpaper
commands.description: Auto-switch random Raycast wallpapers as desktop wallpaper every 1 hour.

preferences.name: layout
preferences.description: Set the layout of the wallpaper items.
preferences.title: Wallpaper Layout

preferences.name: itemSize
preferences.description: Set the size of the wallpaper items. (Only works with Grid layout)
preferences.title: Wallpaper Item Size

preferences.name: applyTo
preferences.title: Apply Wallpaper To
preferences.description: Apply the wallpaper to which monitor. Valid only when you are using an extended monitor.

preferences.name: picturesDirectory
preferences.title: Pictures Directory
preferences.description: The directory of pictures to save. Path format: /Users/Username/Downloads or ~/Downloads.
